Data Structures | Macros
Network Interface

Detailed Description

This is the interface for network devices. These requests must be implemented by any network interface (ethernet, wifi, etc) in order for LWIP to be able to use the network interface.

Data Structures

struct  netif_attr_t
 Network Interface attributes. More...
 

Macros

#define I_NETIF_INIT
 
#define I_NETIF_LEN
 

Macro Definition Documentation

#define I_NETIF_INIT

This request initializes the network interface.

Example:

1 ioctl(fildes, I_NETIF_INIT);
#define I_NETIF_LEN

This request returns the number of bytes that are ready to be read from the network interface.

Example:

1 int len;
2 len = ioctl(fildes, I_NETIF_LEN);
